skills.name: Manual Testing
skills.description: Testing the software manually without using any automated tools.

skills.name: Automation Testing
skills.description: Testing the software using automated tools.

skills.name: API Testing
skills.description: Testing the application programming interfaces (APIs) used in the software.

skills.name: Performance Testing
skills.description: Testing the performance of the software under different conditions and loads.

skills.name: Security Testing
skills.description: Testing the security of the software against different types of attacks.

skills.name: Mobile Testing
skills.description: Testing the software on mobile devices such as smartphones and tablets.
